document.full_text: in one of his sternest warnings yet concerning civilian casualties, president hamid karzai said nato must stop air attacks on afghan homes or face 'unilateral action' from the afghan government.
document.title: karzai gives 'last' warning to nato on airstrikes
lines_and_colors: in one of his sternest warnings yet concerning civilian casualties, president hamid karzai said nato must stop air attacks on afghan homes or face 'unilateral action' from the afghan government.
